comment.body: I don't know veracrypt but if you use linux you can chose cryptsetup too. Don't use truecrypt it has license problem thus "not safe".

I just take a look with VeraCrypt lincense :
{{VeraCrypt is multi-licensed under Apache License 2.0 and
the TrueCrypt License version 3.0, a verbatim copy of both
licenses can be found below.}}

I don't consider this as open source, Truecrypt make his own license instead picking from current one.
But it's ok if you don't care about license, your data have no related with that.

Very cool idea.
BTW, I see your (this) comment in my zerome, do you post it in your zerome?

做事光明正大, 但是還是需要隱藏身份, 因為身份是一個弱點, 會被惡意利用.
現實身份 (或網路開放身份) 要跟網路匿名身份區隔開來. 如果你有多個帳號把網路開放身份和網路匿名分開來, 那很好.

@Watcher: Yeah, if you don't connect any activities with your person identity, you can talk and do whatever you want even against your country law, but always note agency have ability to get your information, not of if it is possible, but if it worth it.

In another way, there are always much more priority issue for them to deal with everyday, so basically no need to be too worry about.
最上面那個影片會覆蓋其他文字, 不知道是不是浮動沒設計好的關係.

@Flyman: Oh, NVM, I don't have enough familiar with this system works, you're right.
I see your post just because I'd clicked "follow you" button before.
@Flyman: Yes, I mean nevermind :) Maybe I should always keep it simple, don't use short codes.
